fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Duel someone at Charge Card Battle during the day. They are super-roleblocked the night after.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
How Charge Card Battle works:
Both you and your opponent have 8 hearts and start with 0 energy
Each turn, you both pick 3 cards.
Then, the first cards are compared, as are the seconds and the thirds.
When you lose all hearts, you lose.
--Cards--
**Charge:**
Charge 1 Energy.
**Beam:**
Use 1 Energy to deal 2 Hearts of damage.
**Special:**
Use 3 Energy to deal 3 Hearts of damage.
**Block:**
Completely nullify a Beam or a Special.
--
In the case of Special vs Beam, Special goes through.
---------
-If you win, you deal an Unstoppable Attack to your target.
-If you lose, you cant use your ability the next day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Win 3 games of Charge Card Battle
